name: Reef Aquarium
description:
Download the magnificent coral reefs of the deep blue to your console. Feel the atmosphere of the underwater world and watch its inhabitants swimming around you. You will see the most vivid ocean fishes there. Fish library will help you to find out more about these amazing creatures. And do not forget to feed fish and play with them – fish are very easy to get upset.

• 1 player offline available
• Minimum 9Mb free space required for storing the game on PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system
• Minimum 160Kb free space required for creating game save data on the PSP® system
